body_html: I think get_variable can now take a tf.Tensor as an initializer, which is probably sufficient if that tensor is a tf.constant set by a numpy array. Closing due to inactivity, though we could re-open if this was insufficient.
body_text: I think get_variable can now take a tf.Tensor as an initializer, which is probably sufficient if that tensor is a tf.constant set by a numpy array.  Closing due to inactivity, though we could re-open if this was insufficient.
body: I think get_variable can now take a tf.Tensor as an initializer, which is probably sufficient if that tensor is a tf.constant set by a numpy array.  Closing due to inactivity, though we could re-open if this was insufficient.
